name: Icecream Catch
description:
1V1 Party Game!!!

Play with your friends by using the same computer 

Player1: "s" release icecream, "w" release props

Player2: "↓"release icecream, "↑" release props

two players heap ice creams according to their own menu order, get the same order with menu can remove corresponding ice creams and get score. 

If the ice creams are toppling down. player will lose ten points.

Two minutes to the end and calculate score, player who get the higher score win this game.

There are two special ice creams in the game and if catch them successfully, player will get a prop, one prop can change opponent's current menu and another can change opponent's current ice cream. Player only can get one prop once a time, new prop will replace old prop.
